title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.4 - Filing and approval of forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.4 - Filing and approval of forms

State Regulations
(a) No policy of life insurance, application, conditional receipt, temporary insurance agreement, notice of proposed insurance, or other form pertaining to, or providing a life insurance unemployment lapse protection benefit shall be delivered or issued for delivery in this State, unless the forms have been filed with and approved by the superintendent. (b) If the unemployment lapse protection benefit is provided by rider or endorsement, the insurer shall in writing identify all policy forms with which the rider or endorsement is intended for use. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
